Link.Description: Financial Aid Verification and Appeals Forms
Link.HOVER_OVER_TEXT: This is where you need to go if you have been selected for financial aid verification or if you need to appeal your aid package.
Link.COMMENTS: Used in CalCentral Financial Resources card. Update also UC_CX_FA_COMM_FAFSA for Communications card

Link.HOVER_OVER_TEXT: This is where you need to go if you have been selected for financial aid verification or if you need to appeal your aid package.

Link.HOVER_OVER_TEXT: You can find other financial aid forms outside of verification and appeals - including how to apply for aid using the FAFSA or Cal ISIR- by going here.
